content: https://i.ibb.co/bRpKh6w/puliwebsite.png$PULI - THE FUTURE OF MEME TOKENS IS FINALLY HERE ★ WEBSITE ★ TWITTER ★ TELEGRAM GROUP ★ TELEGRAM BOUNTY ★ ABOUT $PULI?Puli currently offers play to earn mobile gaming, staking, a core high quality MMO RPG Game with NFT integration (coming soon), as well as… major utility development plans for a unique type of P2E launch pad called “PuliPad” The team at puli are also working on a unique type of referral system built on proven affiliate marketing strategies …Our Puli NFTS will be a central source of the entire ecosystem… where they will be given stronger and stronger use cases as the technology continues to roll out.We here at Puli believe that crypto can be both safe and fun for everyone, and are aiming to create an investor safe haven on the BSC (Binance Smart Chain)★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY DETAILS★★★★★1. Bounty Campaign is managed by PanduGeddonrozak2. $30,000 worth of BUSD will be divided to all participants depending on stakes accumulated3. Bounty Campaign will run for 4 weeks -  16/05/2022 - 12/06/20224. Bounty rewards will be distributed 1 week after the bounty ends.5. Bounty rewards will be sent to your BEP20 Wallet address6. Wallet address cannot be change once submitted7. Participants must join the bounty group8. I'am just a campaign manager and distribution is done by the project team.★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY RULES★★★★★1. Must follow telegram channel2. Must join telegram bounty - https://t.me/+p2Ne3GqqBM9iNjM13. KYC is not required to join and receive rewards from Reality bounty campaign4. Newbie account is accepted5. User with negative trust from DT members will be accepted★★★★★BOUNTY ALLOCATION★★★★★Twitter: 50%Reddit: 30%Telegram: 20%★★★★★BOUNTY SCHEDULE★★★★★Week 1: 16/05/2022 - 22/05/2022 = ENDWeek 2: 23/05/2022 - 29/05/2022Week 3: 30/05/2022 - 05/06/2022Week 4: 06/06/2022 - 12/06/2022Proof Of Registration FormatQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BEP20  Wallet Address:★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow puli twitter profile: https://twitter.com/puli_token2. Twitter Account must have atleast 300 followers3. Participants must RT + Quote (Max of 1 per day) 5 tweets made by Reality Token4. Participants must tweet 2 original tweet (Max of 1 per day)6. HASTAG : #NFT #NFTCommunity #MINT #PULI #TOKEN #P2E #play2earn #PULIFAM #PULI★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★300 to 1999 Followers = 1 Stake2000 to 5000 Followers = 2 Stakes5001 and Up Followers = 3 StakesForm: https://forms.gle/oezE9fcxxMAaqkP18★★★★★REDDIT CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Follow Reddit account: https://www.reddit.com/r/Puli_Inu/2. Must create an informative post about Puli_token3. Max of 5 post per participants per week in different crypto related subreddit group4. Minimum of 30 post karma to participate★★★★★REDDIT CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★30 - 100 Post Karma = 1 Stake101 - 399 Post Karma = 2 Stake400 and Up Post karma = 3  StakeForm: https://forms.gle/5PsYby4j9i1cfuHFA★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Participants must share Puli_Token in 5 different crypto related telegram "SHILL" groups without getting banned or post getting deleted.2. Must create an informative post about Puli_Token3. No SPAM or Junk post4. Must include Telegram group link on your post.5. Max of 5 post per week6. HASTAG : #NFT #NFTCommunity #MINT #PULI #TOKEN #P2E #play2earn #PULIFAM #PULI★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★10 Stake per valid postForm: https://forms.gle/htbQSg1j2Jgn5xZu9★★★★★CAMPAIGN REPORTING GUIDE★★★★★Bitcointalk UsernameBitcointalk Profile LinkProof of Authentication Link:Week # Twitter CampaignRT + Quote #1: RT + Quote #2: RT + Quote #3: RT + Quote #4: RT + Quote #5: Own Tweet #1Own Tweet #2Reddit CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Post Link #4Post Link #5Telegram CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Post Link #5Post Link #5SPREADSHEETS update soon
